title: Best Buy Labor Day sale 2021: deals on TVs, appliances, laptops, vacuums and more
author: mackenzie-frazier
summary: The Best Buy Labor Day sales event is here - see today's top deals
article: The Best Buy Labor Day sales event has arrived with incredible deals on everything from TVs, appliances, and laptops to vacuums, headphones, air fryers, and more. To help you find all the top offers in one place, we've rounded up the top deals from the Best Buy Labor Day sale below.

So what's on sale during the Labor Day sales event? The Best Buy Labor Day sale is known for its fantastic deals on major appliances, and this year's sale doesn't disappoint with over $500 in savings from Samsung, Whirlpool, GE, and a free $100 e-gift card with a select laundry package totaling $999 or more. You can also find fantastic bargains on TVs with prices starting at just $139.99 and epic bargains on laptops, like up to $400 off Dell laptops for students. If you're looking for more standout offers, Best Buy the versatile Surface Pro on sale for a record-low price of $599 (was $959.99) and the top-rated Insignia Digital Multi-Cooker marked down to just $59.99 (was $119.99). See more of the top deals from the Best Buy Labor Day sale below and keep in mind that these incredible offers end on Monday, so you should take advantage now before it's too late.

You see more bargains with our roundup of the best cheap TV deals and sales and the best cheap laptop deals. You can also see more offers with our guide to the best Labor Day TV sales and the best Labor Day laptop sales.
